name: Crimson Blades (Part 2)
description:
Crimson Blades is a Fantasy RPG Maker Game made by 5 french students of "Sup de Création".

Frenelle, heir of the God Slayers, must fix the ancestral lance of her family. Without it, it will be impossible to kill the Goddess wishing her ill will. To reach this goal, she'll be accompanied in her adventures by Dewin, a powerful fighter-mage and Cruinne, a mysterious golem. An epic and grandiose story, melting together dangers, legends and magical twists.
